abstract: Boeing and a joint venture of Northrop Grumman and the European maker of Airbus planes are competing for the $35 billion contract.
snippet: Boeing and a joint venture of Northrop Grumman and the European maker of Airbus planes are competing for the $35 billion contract.
lead_paragraph: NATIONAL HARBOR, Md.  Defense Secretary Robert M. Gates said on Wednesday that he would put the United States Air Force in charge of awarding a $35 billion contract for refueling tankers even though it botched two earlier efforts.

headline.main: U.S. Air Force to Take Lead on Tanker Contract
headline.print_headline: Air Force Leads Again In Tanker Contract

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
